moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Good as New!
moves.effect: Fully restores an ally’s HP. Removes all status conditions from an ally. Removes the confused, flinching, and trapped conditions from an ally.

syncMove.name: New Dawn Wood Hammer
syncMove.description: The more the user’s Attack has been raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Power Siphon 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Attack and raises the user’s Attack by an equal amount when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: Vigilance
passives.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
